short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension loads recalls from Transport Canada (TC) on different car shopping and review websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small extension that loads Transport Canada (TC) vehicle recalls directly on Edmunds.com and autocatch.com

This extension is not endorsed by Transport Canada, Edmunds.com or autocatch.com

** Always check the recall status on a particular vehicle with the manufacturer, this serves only to assist shoppers identify potential issues with a future purchase **
